mean_cn: adj. 古怪的，反复无常的，不稳定的
mean_en: acting, moving, or changing in ways that are not expected or usual :not consistent or regular
word_etyma: err漫游 + atic形容词后缀 → erratic 飘忽的,行为古怪的
sentence: What erratic weather! I've experienced four seasons in just one week!
sentence_trans: 这什么鬼天气，我一周就经历了一个春夏秋冬！
